name: FUTURA
author: Autoproject Inc.

sections.description:
This plugin show high related post with using AI technology.
Also this plugin give you intelligent search technology.
Easy to install, and you can use free for 30 days.
You will see the detail with here.
https://futura.site

How to use Related Posts

After you activate license, click “analyze” button.
Then you can get related posts in your post.
You can make more detail setting with detailed setting page.

How to use FUTURA Search

You can use shortcode or you can use url to use it.
– Shorcode [futura_search]
– URL https://yourdomain.com/futura_search/?keyword=ABC
sections.installation:
You can install this plugin directly from your WordPress dashboard.
Then please create account here.
https://account.futura.site

  1. Go to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
  2. Search for futura.
  3. Click Install Now next to the futura plugin.
  4. Activate the plugin.
  5. Create account here, and get license key.
    https://account.futura.site
  6. Please input license key in futura plugin admin page.
